Class Coroutine

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Coroutine
public abstract class Coroutine
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Class coroutine implements single control flow for multiple threads. Functions attach and deatach controls threads and switches between them.

          Action to perform on exit thread

protected  void attach(Coroutine c)
          This methods fires coroutine c and this thread falls asleep

Constructor Detail

Coroutine

public Coroutine()
Configure coroutine creating bed for sleeping. Object created first is immediately launched.
